_sText: Surf-machine2_remix_v1 ______________________ Look my other submissions Here! - Keep in mind that this is an early preview of the v1 a new v2 will follow with a lot more features! - This map was originally made by Z-machine and was reloaded by me! - Map can host 32 players / same as original. - Map has cystom skybox and all new textures that stand out from the old machine2. - The jail system has changed a bit from the original, there are three buttons ( Red ) ( Yellow ) ( Green ) - The red button activates a env_steam wich makes a heat wave and kills the players. - The yellow button opens the jail door 7 seconds after it has been pressed. - The green button opens the door immediately. - Some ideas were taken from surf_triangle and surf_machine_remix_v2 by Paper- Cut. - I have added very much props in the map, and although this is just an aplha i think it has nearly no bugs. - I have also remove all old edges and added smooth corners and edges on all possible surface. - And please rate the map after you play it and not accordingly of the images as they do not show the whole map and the stuff it has got. - I placed a monitor on the Z-top ich you can see the jail in. - Custom weapon dispencers. - Melons replaced with oranges xD - All textures replaced with new - 60 % smoother ramp - Many places to honour Z-machine - + A "Pro" way - The proway can be found on top of the Z-top there it is a round teleport wich leads you to an easy outdoor skill surf for the newbies at surf. - Time spent on map this far: 6 hours + 10 min compile - Map has been majorly optimized since it has got many more planes after the smooth edges and these stuff. - 4 hudhints - Map automaticly sets the sv_airaccelerate to 150 Enjoy & Have fun! [b]EDIT[/b] Rar now working!
